subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities to restore and protect ecosystems against potential degradation strengthened
subproject.description:
Project components:
1. Strenghthening the capacity of MINIRENA/REMA to fulfil its mandate

2. Adopting collaborative planning and management of environment and natural resources of Lake Kivu shores and associated riverbanks

3. Support to sustainable livelihoods by strenghthening community based institutions and structures for natural resources management.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Decentralization & Environment
